<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/service/{serviceId}/{instanceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a specific external service by its serviceId and instanceId

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-Forwarded-Proto","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-Forwarded-Host","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"serviceId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"maxLength":2147483647,"minLength":1,"type":"string"}},{"name":"instanceId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}

>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"ExternalService retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["homepageUrl","label","serviceId","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"realm":{"type":"string","readOnly":true},"isGlobal":{"type":"boolean","readOnly":true},"serviceId":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"instanceId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"version":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"icon":{"type":"string"},"label":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"homepageUrl":{"maxLength":512,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["AVAILABLE","UNAVAILABLE"]}},"title":"ExternalService"}}}},"404":{"description":"ExternalService not found"}}}
>
